DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to measure markers of inflammatory and oxidative stress known to be associated with cardiovascular morbidity in snoring children. In addition, to measure markers of local inflammation and to evaluate the response to treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Sleep Disordered Breathing in Children: Inflammation and Oxidative Stress
DOC.criteria: children ages 6 months18 years suspected sleepdisordered breathing or will attend the preoperative ENT clinic for adenoidectomy or adenotonsillectomy craniofacial abnormalities neurological disorders genetic disorders infectious disease chronic inflammatory disease any underlying chronic medical condition
